text: Heya, yeah same - we are doing our version of Hackathon for this sprint, where everyone pitches ideas and it's a free-for-all as to which feature / task you want to be involved with. Busy indeed :slightly_smiling_face:

I'm not quite sure yet of how this mentor-mentee thing works and out of fear of spamming you with information on me, I'll start by asking you a little bit about yourself (if that's okay heh).
How did you get into FX and why not a different specialization?
